question: Thangjam Tababi Devi has won gold at the 2017 Asian Cadet Judo Championship (ACJC). She hails from which Indian state?
explanation: India has bagged three medals at the recently concluded 2017 Asian Cadet Judo Championship (ACJC) in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan. In it, Thangjam Tababi Devi of Manipur won gold for India in the girl’s below 44kg weight category, while Haryana’s Simran clinched a bronze in the girl’s below 40kg division and Paramjeet of Haryana bagged bronze medal in the boy’s below 90kg category.
